CustomField.description: Human friendly format for the roll, for example 3d6+2.
CustomField.formula: TEXT(Number_of_Dice__c) & "d" & TEXT(Sides__c) & IF( OR(ISBLANK(Modifier__c), Modifier__c = 0), "", IF(Modifier__c > 0, "+" & TEXT(Modifier__c), TEXT(Modifier__c)) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Human friendly format for the roll, for example 3d6+2 or 2d20-6.
CustomField.label: Dice Notation
